item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Michael Shannon cast as General Zod in 'Man of Steel'
item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded: Boardwalk Empire's disgraced Atlantic City Prohibition Agent will leave New Jersey in favor of Krypton when he dons the role of the legendary outlaw alien general. 'Man Of Steel' hits theaters in June of 2013. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. item.excerpt:encoded: Boardwalk Empire's disgraced Atlantic City Prohibition Agent will leave New Jersey in favor of Krypton when he dons the role of the legendary outlaw alien general. 'Man Of Steel' hits theaters in June of 2013.

item.title: Dark Knight Rises to hit theaters in July
item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded: The Dark Knight Rises will hit theaters in late July completing Christopher Nolan’s Batman trilogy. 2008’s The Dark Knight starred the late Heath Ledger as the evil Joker. During its opening weekend the film raked in $158, 411, 483. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. item.title: 'The Social Network's Andrew Garfield to play 'Spiderman' in reboot
item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded: Five years since the release of "Spiderman 3," Sony Pictures is releasing “The Amazing Spider-Man.” After the cancellation of the "Spiderman 4," production began for a rebooted version instead of another sequel.  “The Amazing-Spiderman” is filled with a complete new cast with actor Andrew Garfield playing Peter Parker and “Easy A” actress Emma Stone playing his high school love interest, Gwen Stacy. In this version, Parker is a regular high school student that tries to unravel his mysterious past regarding the disappearance of his parents. After discovering his father's briefcase, he becomes closer to realizing his true identity and begins his journey towards becoming Spiderman. “The Amazing-Spiderman” will hit theaters July 3.
item.excerpt:encoded: Five years since the release of “Spiderman 3,” Sony Pictures is releasing “The Amazing Spider-Man.” After the cancellation of the “Spiderman 4,” production began for a rebooted version instead of another sequel.

item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded: Five years since the release of "Spiderman 3," Sony Pictures is releasing “The Amazing Spider-Man.” After the cancellation of the "Spiderman 4," production began for a rebooted version instead of another sequel.  “The Amazing-Spiderman” is filled with a complete new cast with actor Andrew Garfield playing Peter Parker and “Easy A” actress Emma Stone playing his high school love interest, Gwen Stacy. In this version, Parker is a regular high school student that tries to unravel his mysterious past regarding the disappearance of his parents. After discovering his father's briefcase, he becomes closer to realizing his true identity and begins his journey towards becoming Spiderman. “The Amazing-Spiderman” will hit theaters July 3.

item.title: Michael Shannon cast as General Zod in 'Man of Steel'
item.dc:creator: jmarx
item.content:encoded: Boardwalk Empire's disgraced Atlantic City Prohibition Agent will leave New Jersey in favor of Krypton when he dons the role of the legendary outlaw alien general. 'Man Of Steel' hits theaters in June of 2013. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
